alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Murray (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Murray and Fannin Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1140 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Cohutta Wilderness to near Jones Mill to near Crandall, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Blue Ridge, Morganton, Conasauga Lake, Mineral Bluff, Jones Mill, Higdon, Colwell, Loving, Cohutta Wilderness and Epworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for north central and northwestern Georgia.
